english: Shanghai is a technologically advanced city .
chinese: 上海是中国的一个技术先进的城市。

english: Such firms are go-ahead in more ways than one .
chinese: 这样的公司在许多方面都是先进的。

english: More modern fluid bed driers are now much in use .
chinese: 目前大量应用的是更先进的流化床干燥器。

english: This advanced method has been introduced in every factory .
chinese: 这种先进的操作方法已在各厂推行。

english: The 14-inch torpedo has no hope of crippling a modern dreadnought .
chinese: 355毫米鱼雷不能重创一艘先进的无畏战舰。
先进的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A still more advanced technique produces what are called "integrated circuits" .
chinese: 还有一项更为先进的技术，创造了所谓的“集成电路。”

english: More investment spending implies the use of more sophisticated equipment and machinery .
chinese: 更多的投资支出又意味着使用更加先进的机器和设备。

english: We should apply advanced experience according to local conditions and shouldn't apply it mechanically ..
chinese: 对先进的经验我们应该因地制宜，不应生搬硬套。

english: It survives in the effluents of waste treatment plants, even those employing advanced treatment methods .
chinese: 尽管采取了先进的处理方法，它仍残留在废水处理工厂的排放液中。

english: Improved nondestructive evaluation procedures have enabled defects to be found that would have gone unnoticed earlier .
chinese: 先进的无损检测方法将从前被忽视的缺陷检测出来。

english: Researchers do not yet know if more sophisticated techniques of animal husbandry will work with water buffaloes .
chinese: 研究人员现在还不知道先进的畜牧业技术是否也适用于水牛。

english: New and more sophisticated methods of physiological control should be available to the seed orchard manager .
chinese: 新的和更先进的生理控制方法，对于种子园管理人员将会有效的。

english: There was, however, one ray of hope: the development of an aggressive and advanced leadership among both races .
chinese: 不过，有一线希望：在白人和黑人双方，一种积极进取的和先进的领导层正在成长。

english: Three other incidents revealed the extent to which the president opposed or refused to encourage advanced progressive legislation .
chinese: 还有三件事表明总统反对或拒绝支持先进的进步立法达到何等程度。

english: Advanced multi - clock mechanism and clock generator
chinese: 先进的多时钟机制和时钟发生器
